subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Matthew Lombardi and Dustin Boyd scored short-handed goals, lifting the Calgary Flames to a 6-2 victory against the visiting Montreal Canadiens. The Flames trailed, 2-1, after the first period.
snippet: Matthew Lombardi and Dustin Boyd scored short-handed goals, lifting the Calgary Flames to a 6-2 victory against the visiting Montreal Canadiens. The Flames trailed, 2-1, after the first period.
